dt: {bc}a member of any of various peoples inhabiting the highlands of central and southern Vietnam

et: borrowed from French, "inhabitant of the mountains," going back to Middle French, from {it}montaigne{/it} {et_link|mountain|mountain} + {it}-ard{/it} {et_link|-ard|-ard}
shortdef: a member of any of various peoples inhabiting the highlands of central and southern Vietnam
